businessProfile.name: Happy Joe's Hiawatha
businessProfile.address: 1950 Blairs Ferry Rd, Hiawatha, IA 52233, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1950 Blairs Ferry Rd, Hiawatha, IA 52233, USA

reviews.text:
Family favorite just like I remember from when I was a kid!

- Pan Bacon: Classic!  The crust comes up at the edges and is soft and not too thick.  Be careful ordering extra bacon as the normal amount is already a lot.  We like bacon a lot and extra bacon was too much.  So good, though!

- Original Bacon: The original crust was a little on the thinner side, almost too thin.

- Gluten-Free Pepperoni: My wife and daughter shared a gluten-free pepperoni pizza and both thoroughly enjoyed it!  They are both not super sensitive to gluten, though.  If you are really sensitive, this place will not work for you.

We had the pizzas on Friday at 5pm.

We get happy joes every Tuesday for the 25% off discount. The employees have always been very friendly and have gone out of their way to be kind! I wish I could remember the person's name who helped me tonight, because he was wonderful! Their taco pizza is 10/10, and everything else is decent too, but nothing out of this world like you might get at a small local pizza place.

Ordered online for delivery.   Delivery time was 2 hours, which wasn't an issue for us.  The problem lied in that the pizzas had clearly been in the delivery vehicle for most of that time frame. The pizzas were inedible by the time they arrived.  The delivery driver was very pleasant, which was the only bright spot.  $55 for 2 pizzas that we couldn't eat isn't ideal.

We ordered happy joes tonight for the first time since the sit down restaurant closed. It tasted a little off but again I haven‚Äôt had it in forever. 2 hours later my son and I both are having to run to the restroom and are super puky! Definitely feels like a case of food poisoning

The person who took our order was the most friendly person. The kind of person that really just lights up your day no matter what mood you are in.
Ordered a taco pizza and it is sooo tasty. Best taco pizza ever!
And the lobby was so nicely decorated too! Just a very welcoming environment overall.
I'll definitely be back.

recentReviews.text:
Family favorite just like I remember from when I was a kid!

- Pan Bacon: Classic!  The crust comes up at the edges and is soft and not too thick.  Be careful ordering extra bacon as the normal amount is already a lot.  We like bacon a lot and extra bacon was too much.  So good, though!

- Original Bacon: The original crust was a little on the thinner side, almost too thin.

- Gluten-Free Pepperoni: My wife and daughter shared a gluten-free pepperoni pizza and both thoroughly enjoyed it!  They are both not super sensitive to gluten, though.  If you are really sensitive, this place will not work for you.

We had the pizzas on Friday at 5pm.

We get happy joes every Tuesday for the 25% off discount. The employees have always been very friendly and have gone out of their way to be kind! I wish I could remember the person's name who helped me tonight, because he was wonderful! Their taco pizza is 10/10, and everything else is decent too, but nothing out of this world like you might get at a small local pizza place.

We ordered happy joes tonight for the first time since the sit down restaurant closed. It tasted a little off but again I haven‚Äôt had it in forever. 2 hours later my son and I both are having to run to the restroom and are super puky! Definitely feels like a case of food poisoning

Ordered online for delivery.   Delivery time was 2 hours, which wasn't an issue for us.  The problem lied in that the pizzas had clearly been in the delivery vehicle for most of that time frame. The pizzas were inedible by the time they arrived.  The delivery driver was very pleasant, which was the only bright spot.  $55 for 2 pizzas that we couldn't eat isn't ideal.
Super fast deliver; piping hot and delicious!

Just had your delivery driver in a black suv try to run me off the road and flip
Me off. Will NEVER order from a place that allows this

First time ordering happy joes. The food tastes good and the staff were great. But something is terribly wrong in the food. Ate the food yesterday (and was the only meal I had yesterday, with leftovers later that day) and today it has got me vomitting, with chills and diahrrea. Definitely a case of food poisoning, the quality of the food needs to be checked out immediately.
Amazing!!! Great Service, Great Customer service! Fantastic Pizza, Sticks, Wings. Thank you, Delivery Time on time and quick!! 10 / 10
Staff was very nice, pizza was great!

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Lehrman
detailedReviews.text:
Family favorite just like I remember from when I was a kid!

- Pan Bacon: Classic!  The crust comes up at the edges and is soft and not too thick.  Be careful ordering extra bacon as the normal amount is already a lot.  We like bacon a lot and extra bacon was too much.  So good, though!

- Original Bacon: The original crust was a little on the thinner side, almost too thin.

- Gluten-Free Pepperoni: My wife and daughter shared a gluten-free pepperoni pizza and both thoroughly enjoyed it!  They are both not super sensitive to gluten, though.  If you are really sensitive, this place will not work for you.

We had the pizzas on Friday at 5pm.

detailedReviews.author: Sydney Koeppen
detailedReviews.text: We get happy joes every Tuesday for the 25% off discount. The employees have always been very friendly and have gone out of their way to be kind! I wish I could remember the person's name who helped me tonight, because he was wonderful! Their taco pizza is 10/10, and everything else is decent too, but nothing out of this world like you might get at a small local pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Berry
detailedReviews.text: We ordered happy joes tonight for the first time since the sit down restaurant closed. It tasted a little off but again I haven‚Äôt had it in forever. 2 hours later my son and I both are having to run to the restroom and are super puky! Definitely feels like a case of food poisoning

detailedReviews.author: iowanole
detailedReviews.text: Ordered online for delivery.   Delivery time was 2 hours, which wasn't an issue for us.  The problem lied in that the pizzas had clearly been in the delivery vehicle for most of that time frame. The pizzas were inedible by the time they arrived.  The delivery driver was very pleasant, which was the only bright spot.  $55 for 2 pizzas that we couldn't eat isn't ideal.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Schoon
detailedReviews.text: Super fast deliver; piping hot and delicious!

detailedReviews.author: sonja evers
detailedReviews.text:
Just had your delivery driver in a black suv try to run me off the road and flip
Me off. Will NEVER order from a place that allows this

detailedReviews.author: Jake
detailedReviews.text: First time ordering happy joes. The food tastes good and the staff were great. But something is terribly wrong in the food. Ate the food yesterday (and was the only meal I had yesterday, with leftovers later that day) and today it has got me vomitting, with chills and diahrrea. Definitely a case of food poisoning, the quality of the food needs to be checked out immediately.

detailedReviews.author: b sommers
detailedReviews.text: Amazing!!! Great Service, Great Customer service! Fantastic Pizza, Sticks, Wings. Thank you, Delivery Time on time and quick!! 10 / 10

detailedReviews.author: Amy Wiemerslage
detailedReviews.text: Staff was very nice, pizza was great!

detailedReviews.author: Zach
detailedReviews.text: Fast and quick. The food is always good. Wish the website was a bit easier and the prices to be cheaper but at least it makes up for it the amount of food you get.

detailedReviews.author: Damon Knowling
detailedReviews.text: Fast and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Bethany Parker
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza and service today.
Thanks Clint!

detailedReviews.author: Marylu Carl
detailedReviews.text:
This visit  so sad. I had Happy Joe's Canadian bacon and sauerkraut pizza when I was in boarding school out in the cornfields of IA back in 1976 and 1977. DELICIOUS! Came back to visit in 1979. DELICIOUS. 44 years later, now it's delivery or carry out. But still hoping for that DELICIOUS pizza. :.(

I bought a large cb and s pizza. I knew I would have a slice in the car on the way to take it to people I visited last in 2019. You know how you take a slice and it is super hot so you quickly get it out of the box and put it down? This pizza was barely warm. Part of the crust was burnt (2 slices). The tips(?) Of the sauerkraut were burnt (black). I never had that before! It was dry. All we could figure out was maybe they had made it for earlier in the day and kept it in a warmer(right at the counter). It was bad, even if it was just plain cheese. So sad. I waited 44 years to have that pizza again. If this is how that pizza is made now, sad. The guy that waited on me was in his 50s I think. Silly me, I thought he might be the manager, so I will definitely get a great pizza. Sad. Sad Sad.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Hagerman
detailedReviews.text: Had 2 orders for carryout. 1 came out edible, and the other was God awful. Looked like it was 5 days old. Completely unedible. Both orders called in within 1 minute of each other. Got tossed after sampling multiple pieces. The garlic bread was just as bad, if not worse. Customer service was ok, but that pizza was by far the worst pizza we have ever tried. Will not be ordering anymore happy joes pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Clingan-Siverly
detailedReviews.text:
The person who took our order was the most friendly person. The kind of person that really just lights up your day no matter what mood you are in.
Ordered a taco pizza and it is sooo tasty. Best taco pizza ever!
And the lobby was so nicely decorated too! Just a very welcoming environment overall.
I'll definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Diane Anderson
detailedReviews.text: I went there to purchase a gift card.

detailedReviews.author: Greg Finch
detailedReviews.text: Never been there just me so ordered a small beef and mushroom pizza ..15.00!!! For something smaller than a dinner plate! .the beef dried out the sauce almost none this tasted like a store bought 3.00  pizza I couldn't even eat it sadly staff was nice and friendly ,but the price waaaaayyyyyy to high for almost nothing , I mean I could have bought a frozen pizza for half or a burger for 6.00  .cannot recommend and I was hoping I could

detailedReviews.author: Scott Niles
detailedReviews.text: Showed up on my lunch break.  Pizza was made and ready in about 10 minutes. I  love Happy Joe's pizza üçï Yum

detailedReviews.author: MANKICKIN
detailedReviews.text: Pizza taste the same as it always has really tasty

detailedReviews.author: Tina Kilker
detailedReviews.text: Do not get the taco pizza

detailedReviews.author: Casey Stelken
detailedReviews.text:
Food is great... when they get it right.  We've received our orders from this location wrong more times than we've had them right (no, really), hence the low rating.

But when they get it right, damn is it good.  And some of the employees are super friendly, which is always a plus.

detailedReviews.author: Brad Neilly
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff. Always great tasting pizza. Use the app for deals and discounts.

detailedReviews.author: Nikki Blix
detailedReviews.text: Well, they had the best pizza. I guess they changed their BLT pizza. They gave it to us deconstructed. My son said the mayo was in a package and it was disgusting. I'm so disappointed. It was my favorite pizza. We won't come back until they change it back. *Sorry, someone told us it wasn't temporary. We look forward to the BLT comeback!!!! Very glad to hear this.

detailedReviews.author: Kymm Smith
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service. Jay was a great help with my pick up order

detailedReviews.author: Jen
detailedReviews.text: Super fast, super nice staff. Pizza was hot and ready and on time. Can't ask for much more. And Mondays and Tuesdays right now are running a special - when you order any large pizza (including taco!) it's only $15!

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Kvarda
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was good but some of the toppings were a little crispy.   Google maps shows dine-in but it is carry out and delivery only.

detailedReviews.author: tech king
detailedReviews.text: Good

detailedReviews.author: April Gatefold
detailedReviews.text: Daughter loved the gluten-free taco, the rest of us were like meh, we've had better for that price. $54 for 2 lrg & a small GF

detailedReviews.author: John Gagnon
detailedReviews.text: $42 for a small, medium pizza and bread sticks.  Too pricey and the quality of the pizzas was poor.

detailedReviews.author: Troy Springer
detailedReviews.text: I have been a long time customer of Happy Joe"s pizza. As of late the pizza quality and service has slipped. The "Deal breaker" happened on 9/25/21 when I waited over an hour for my pizza ( that is not the problem because I agreed to the time) and when it arrived it was dried out and just warm. Because issues like this have happened a few times we just are not going to be able to do business any longer.

detailedReviews.author: Teresa Kohlmeyer
detailedReviews.text: Best taco pizza ever!!!

detailedReviews.author: Shaun Scott
detailedReviews.text: Best Service! We ordered a  Large Canadian bacon pizza to be ready at 11 to pick up. Our daughter had an emergency at school and we had to drive back across town leaving our pizza sit there for 45 minutes. Called the store to ask them if our pizza was still there and hadn't been tossed but that we would still be on our way to pick it up. On arrival at 1150ish we went in to grab the pizza and they told us that it was almost done. I was confused because I didn't ask for a new one, it was my fault anyway. The general manager Teagan had already taken the initiative and made us a new pizza because she didn't want us to eat and old looking one. She went above and beyond to make our experience good even though it was our fault and not theirs!!!!! I will forever go to this location from now on.

detailedReviews.author: Tiana Doll
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pick up tonight. Very clean and organized pick up. The front desk employee was so sweet and after I signed my receipt I offered to wait in my car and come back in when it was finished. She was sweet enough to bring the food out to me when it got done so I wouldn't have walk back in.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin over 60
detailedReviews.text: Best Taco Pizza in CR area.  My family is eatting these more instead of tacos. (Taco restaurants need to improve their amounts inside taco shell.)  This Happy Joes Pizza taco pizza is full of meat, cheese, lettuce and more.  They give you packets of flavorful taco sauces too.  Note on Mondays and Tuesdays, they are much cheaper (less than $19) ... a real bargain!

detailedReviews.author: Jon Burdt
detailedReviews.text: Best taco pizza

detailedReviews.author: Diana Usher
detailedReviews.text: Not there

detailedReviews.author: Don Danielson
detailedReviews.text: Expensive pizza and no sit down dining

detailedReviews.author: Don Daugherty
detailedReviews.text: They have a very friendly staff, especially two sisters Kathy&Tina that are just a hoot. They not only see you to your every want or need, but they make you feel extremely welcome, which makes you want to hurry back.    The buffet area is always well stocked , replenished and clean. It's always my family's first choice.

detailedReviews.author: Noah B
detailedReviews.text: Consistently great.

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Allen
detailedReviews.text: Did not know it was carry out or delivery only so had to go somewhere else as we were on motorcycles.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 4.0/5 rating from 55 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the fast delivery and consistently hot, delicious pizza. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and welcoming staff create a positive dining experience that customers appreciate. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The taco pizza is a standout favorite, often described as the best ever. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues related to food quality and delivery experiences - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility and incorrect information about dine-in options - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Lack of awareness about the restaurant's current offerings and ambiance - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
